org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement

Class HeartbeatManager.Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.HeartbeatManager.Stats
  • Enclosing class:
    HeartbeatManager

    private static class HeartbeatManager.Stats
extends Object
    Datanode statistics. For decommissioning/decommissioned nodes, only used capacity is counted.
